page.title: 07Garden City-Part Of Sealand.
page.content: Garden City is one part of Sealand,it has many houses.These houses used to belong to the British Steel Corporation,and the people living in them worked in the Steel Works itself. These are also many council houses. Also there are some new flats for pensioners; these are by the playing fields and are very light and spacious.In this area there are a number of small shops - butcher, grocer, green grocer,chemist and post office.This area also has a public house and two clubs.One is the British Legion Club and the other the Sealand Working Men's Club.This club also has a bowling green.Some of the streets are lined with trees.These look very beautiful in the summer.
